writeups: the class today will consist in understanding spaces in relationship to art. we will start by developing a definition of what makes a space (e.g. through the contexts of place, context, situation, physical and data layers), and then how art is constrained to some specifc places, namely the contemporary art gallery.

writeups: You should have chosen your groups and decided on your concept before you leave on Spring break. You will have ten days when you come back from Spring Break to implement your idea.

As you read the press release, think of what big themes are emerging: images, internet, appropriation, logos, quality of drawing, etc. and think about how you could highlight or contrast one of these aspects with an augmented reality application.
